test_strategy_covers_all_types.notes: Structural validation (primary), regression guards, positioning checks. Integration/E2E/security/performance documented as N/A with rationale (prompt-only fix).

test_cases_exist_for_all_requirements.notes: 20 test cases (T01-T20) covering 16 ACs across 4 FRs + 3 NFRs. 100% requirement coverage.

traceability_matrix_complete.notes: traceability-matrix.csv maps all 16 ACs and 3 NFRs to test cases. No orphan tests, no uncovered ACs.

coverage_targets_defined.notes: 100% AC coverage target, 0 regression target, 20 new tests in lib/orchestrator-scope-overrun.test.js.

test_data_strategy_documented.notes: test-data-plan.md documents orchestrator file as input, extracted sections, positive/negative regex patterns, position validation data.

critical_paths_identified.notes: 5 critical paths identified: MODE enforcement exists, uses CRITICAL language, Section 4a guard present, Section 4 algo check, backward compatibility.

article_II.notes: Test cases designed before implementation (Phase 05 before Phase 06). 20 tests across unit/structural/regression.

article_VII.notes: Traceability matrix complete: 16 ACs + 3 NFRs -> 20 test cases. 100% coverage, no orphan tests.

article_IX.notes: All GATE-05 checklist items pass. Artifacts complete and validated.

article_XI.notes: No integration tests required (prompt-only fix, no runtime code changes). Integration testing integrity applies to code changes only.
